csc311.project1

Class MovieSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc311.project1.MovieSearch

  • public class MovieSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    MovieSearch Class
    Class to search through an array of Movies to check for matches
    Uses Movie nameCheck method which returns true if the names match
    And Movie genreCheck method which returns true if the genres match
    Since:
    9/10/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovieSearch()
      Default Constructor
      --Not Used--
      Creates a new array of Movie and sets name to null
      MovieSearch(Movie[] movieArray)
      Overloaded Constructor
      ------------
      Description:
      Takes movieArray as parameter for use in startSearch method

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startSearch(java.lang.String name, int searchType)
      startSearch Method
      ------------
      Description:
      Starts the search by using a for loop to iterate through the array
      For every match found it uses the Movie displayMovie method to print the Movie information
      If no match is found it prints that Movie was not found

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovieSearch

        public MovieSearch()
        Default Constructor
        --Not Used--
        Creates a new array of Movie and sets name to null

      • MovieSearch

        public MovieSearch(Movie[] movieArray)
        Overloaded Constructor
        ------------
        Description:
        Takes movieArray as parameter for use in startSearch method
        Parameters:
        movieArray - (Required) Array of movies to search through

    • Method Detail

      • startSearch

        public void startSearch(java.lang.String name,
                        int searchType)
        startSearch Method
        ------------
        Description:
        Starts the search by using a for loop to iterate through the array
        For every match found it uses the Movie displayMovie method to print the Movie information
        If no match is found it prints that Movie was not found
        Parameters:
        name - (Required) A string to search for in name or genre
        searchType - (Required) An int to switch off of to determine search type (1 = name search, 2 = genre search)
